member.name: T:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.Car

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.Car.Price
member.summary: This method is specific to the Storebaelt requirements: On weekends, a discount of 20% is granted. An eventual Brobizz discount is deducted after the weekend discount.
member.returns: The total price after including all eventual discounts.

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.Car.GetWeekendDiscount(System.Double)

member.returns: The amount of the weekend discount.

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.Car.GetBrobizzDiscount(System.Double)
member.summary: This method calculates the Brobizz discount.
member.returns: The amount of the Brobizz discount.
